title: MagicSchool transforms K-12 education for 3M teachers with Claude AI | Anthropic case study \ Anthropic

metadata.title: MagicSchool transforms K-12 education for 3M teachers with Claude AI | Anthropic case study \ Anthropic
metadata.description: Learn how MagicSchool used Claude to power 100M+ AI engagements, support 5,500+ schools, and combat teacher burnout. See how AI-assisted lesson planning and personalized feedback are revolutionizing education while prioritizing privacy and responsible AI use.
